Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • Point

  • public final class Point
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    1.0 Implements an immutable class Point that describes a point in a plane. usage of the class: Point p = new Point(3, 4).translate(1, 3).scale(0.5); should set p to a point with coordinates (2, 3.5).
    Author:
    Kizito Jegede

      Constructs class instance and set it to a specific point
